ygData.subject: Re: Shadow Step
ygData.msgSnippet: ... it s much faster than gate and I ve had gate fizzle a lot. Shadow Step is pretty quick, pretty cheap and basically just gets you out of the way to run or
ygData.messageBody:
> Though I guess, in a dungeon, it would be more helpful, or is that just
> wishful thinking? Also, how long does it take to cast? Faster than Gate
> does, or the same?

it's much faster than gate and I've had gate fizzle a lot. Shadow Step is
pretty quick, pretty cheap and basically just gets you out of the way to run
or cast Gate (though keeping both memorized is a big price). I've only used it
outdoors, no idea about what it would do in a dungeon, but if it could put you
on the other side of a wall from a mob that would be great.

--
